name: Onion Spring - BTH Media Jam 2019 Award Winner
name_original: Onion Spring - BTH Media Jam 2019 Award Winner
description:
You play as Onion Spring, who is searching for the missing seasons.
CONTROLS & HOW TO PLAY

Keyboard
   WASD or arrow keys - Move
   SPACEBAR - Jump
   E or LMB + Direction - Dash

Controller
   LStick - Move
   Y - Jump
   B + Direction - Dash

Collect the summer and winter orbs to unlock the season doors while avoiding the natural hazards that come with each season!

CREDITS

Cecil Quiroga - Pixel Art, BGM and Game Design

Albert Jyllhed - Game Design, Level Design and Programming

Nik Alquist/98ahni - Game Design and Programming
